de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation

Class SidebarViewAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.animation.Animation
      • android.view.animation.TranslateAnimation
        • de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation.SidebarViewAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SidebarViewAnimation
extends android.view.animation.TranslateAnimation
    An animation, which allows to move a sidebar's sidebar view, when the sidebar should be shown or hidden.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • SidebarViewAnimation

        public SidebarViewAnimation(float distance,
                            long duration,
                            android.view.animation.Animation.AnimationListener listener)
        Creates a new animation, which allows to move a sidebar's sidebar view, when the sidebar should be shown or hidden.
        Parameters:
        distance - The distance, the sidebar view should be moved by, as a Float value. If the value is negative, the view will be moved to the left, if it is positive, the view will be moved to the right
        duration - The duration of the animation in milliseconds, as a Long value. The duration may not be less than 0
        listener - The listener, which should be notified about the animation's progress, as an instance of the type AnimationListener . The listener may not be null
